预兆-泥怪: 刺鼻的气味似乎粘附在布料上 Acrid smell that seems to cling to cloth
散发着微弱腐烂气味的霉斑 Mildew faintly reeking of Rot
潮湿的痕迹，盘旋交织 Damp marks, spiraling and swirling
随机路径，无苔藓与霉菌 Random route, moss and mould free
成堆的鹅卵石，仿佛被水流冲刷过般散落一旁 Piles of pebbles, swept aside as if by flow
彩色晶状霜覆盖表面 Colorful crystalline Rime coating surfaces
一滩滩仍在微微嘶嘶作响的腐液 Puddles of ichor, still sizzling slightly
桌子或工具，明显缺少长度 Table or Tool, conspicuously missing length
虫类残骸，被磨得发亮 Vermin remains, scoured shiny
孔洞，间距不均却异常圆润 Holes, unevenly spaced but strangely round
半只抽搐的老鼠，已被烧灼 Half a twitching Rat, cauterized
黏液覆盖，仍在脉动 Muculent coating, still pulsating
